name: Super Ninja Frog
description:
A 2D platformer still in development. I will make a working Linux port and maybe work on Mac. I am currently working on a Windows PC, but I mostly use a Linux machine. I will do thorough testing on Ubuntu 22.04. I don't have a mac to do testing on, so that version will not be tested, and may have some bugs.

New Update v1.1

Added :

- Multiple unintentional bug fixes

- Added bouncing platform

- Mouse now is hidden in game

To add ; 

- Level 4 and above

- Linux port

- I don't know if the Mac port works

- Android port

- fix a major game-breaking bug

- Add more speed running tactics.
